title: Sno-Show (Vermillion Editions' 15th Anniversary Exhibition)
marks:
Signed, annotated LL, in red graphite: [R.G.]
LLC: [#9]
description: Comical illustration featuring an airplane with trailing banner on UL; the Minneapolis Institute of Art in R background; in LL foreground, a mobile print studio with two men working a press while a woman behind them distributes prints to the public through a window; various other characters throughout--an artist and easel, UR; a cloak and dagger figure, upper center, etc.
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of David Parker
